query.statement: INSERT INTO MAP_MOVIE (movie_id, title, director, genre_id, actors, runtime, release_date, ticket_price, now_playing, simple_upload_file_path) VALUES (:movieId, :title, :director, :genreId, :actors, :runtime, :releaseDate, :ticketPrice, :nowPlaying, :filePaths)

UPDATE MAP_MOVIE SET title = :title, director = :director, genre_id = :genreId, actors = :actors, runtime = :runtime, release_date = :releaseDate, ticket_price = :ticketPrice, now_playing = :nowPlaying, simple_upload_file_path = :filePaths WHERE movie_id = :movieId
SELECT movie_id, title, director, genre_id, actors, runtime, release_date, ticket_price, now_playing, simple_upload_file_path as filePaths FROM MAP_MOVIE WHERE movie_id = :movieId

SELECT movie.movie_id, movie.title, movie.director, genre.name, movie.actors, movie.release_date, movie.now_playing FROM MAP_MOVIE movie, MAP_GENRE genre WHERE movie.genre_id = genre.genre_id AND title like '%' || :searchKeyword || '%' AND movie.now_playing = :nowPlayingCondition
